text: @realDonaldTrump You know when you tweeted you were too busy fighting #COVID19 to go throw a ball in Nea York not that anyone has asked you to go? Is this an example? Repetitions inane nonsense and puffs for #FoxNews ? You were whinging on last night about how people don’t like you. Guess why?
